summary: A young girl is sold into a red-light district brothel and tries to adapt to life as an oiran (courtesan).
cast: Anna Tsuchiya|Kippei Shîna|Yoshino Kimura|Hiroki Narimiya|Miho Kanno|Masatoshi Nagase|Masanobu Andô|Kayoko Aoyagi|Ken'ichi Endô|Mayu Fujimori|Gori|Yasushi Higuchi|Akiko Hoshino|Yuki Hyôdô|Sadanji Ichikawa IV|Renji Ishibashi|Hidetoshi Kageyama|Kyôko Koizumi|Narumi Konno|Tomomi Maruyama|Megumi Matsushita|Minami|Keishi Nagatsuka|Yuri Nakamura|Mari Natsuki|Miho Ninagawa|Shun Oguri|Nao Ohmori|SABU|Kenji Takama|Sarara Tsukifune|Ai Yamaguchi|Hiroshi Yamamoto|Shûji Yamamoto
title: Sakuran
